message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider that?
I understand you think $15,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I can meet you in the middle at $12,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13,000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I'm surprised you're not willing to meet me at $13,000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12,500. This is my last offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,750 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.

I've made concessions, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,000. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. I'll make one more offer, but I need to meet my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $12,500, but that's as low as I can go. If you don't accept, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that you've made concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. This is my final offer.
